document_data.name: ''Potion of Mirror Image''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of mirror image''''' were a type of [[magic item]] that created [[illusion|illusory]] images of the imbiber.
document_data.Description: A ''potion of mirror image'' was a white glowing liquid stored in a sealed [[glass]] flask.
document_data.Powers: The effect of these [[potion]]s was similar to that of the ''[[mirror image]]'' [[spell]]. When consumed, the concoction's magics created between two to six incorporeal images of the drinker. Each [[illusion]] was dispelled when the imbiber was attacked by an opponent. The effects of a ''potion of mirror image'' lasted for three minutes.
